EmailTemplate.name: EMEA- AppD London 6/6 - Marketo.6/6 First Send
EmailTemplate.subject: Join us at AppD Global Tour London on 6th June
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, <[[http://appdglobaltourlondon2019.splashthat.com/Turbonomic]]> Turbonomic is sponsoring the AppD Global Tour London <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/tgH0100RZ00gp00ZI0000v9]]> hosted by AppDynamics. The event will bring together IT professionals from across the UK, interested in mastering application and business performance.
Learn how Turbonomic and AppDynamics are transforming the way modern businesses are built and run, providing automated, cross-stack intelligence to drive new opportunities for agents of transformation, reduce risk, and drive better business outcomes. They’ll be unveiling their all-new Central Nervous System, and show you how to lead transformational change in your business with AppDynamics and Cisco.
Register today <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/tgH0100RZ00gp00ZI0000v9]]> to learn, share, network and be inspired by AppDynamics customers who are driving transformation in their businesses and careers.
When: 6th June 08.00 - 17.00 (+ party at The Drift Bar) Where: etc.venues 133 Houndsditch, London
